Class Objects

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.restapi.services.Objects

  • public class Objects
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/objects METHODS: GET
    Author:
    sulfo

      private org.restlet.representation.Representation getObjects()
      Goes through the object's roster and creates a JSON from the visible records.
      org.restlet.representation.Representation represent()
      Returns all available (both exposed and discovered and all adapters) IoT objects that can be seen by that particular object - this does not count objects that are offline.

    • Method Detail

      • represent

        @Get
public org.restlet.representation.Representation represent()
        Returns all available (both exposed and discovered and all adapters) IoT objects that can be seen by that particular object - this does not count objects that are offline.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY Identifiers of IoT objects fulfil the type and maximum constraint and own parameter OR Object description if the OID is specified.

      • getObjects

        private org.restlet.representation.Representation getObjects()
        Goes through the object's roster and creates a JSON from the visible records.
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the list.
